# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to Provide Agricultural Rehabilitation and Small Construction Services for Leased Properties

**Reference Number:** CB-6972-56756773
**Publication Date:** July 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 26, 2023, 3:00 pm EDT

## Overview

The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking a contractor to provide standing offer agreement (SOA) services for agricultural rehabilitation and small construction services for leased properties. This RFSO is for a two-year agreement with the option to extend for an additional year.

## Services Required

The successful contractor will assist the NCC in the rehabilitation of its agricultural buildings, primarily situated within the National Capital Greenbelt. The contractor will undertake renovation and rehabilitation work on existing structures, with no new construction envisioned. The services will range from routine maintenance to broad rehabilitation, anticipated to fall between $40,000 and $150,000.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Tender Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

* The contractor must submit a technical proposal outlining their approach, methodology, experience, and qualifications.
* The evaluation will be based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.
* The NCC reserves the right to request additional information or clarification from the contractor.

## Submission and Closing Instructions

* Electronic submissions must be made through the Government Electronic Tendering Service website (Tender Opportunities | CanadaBuys).
* The closing date for submissions is July 26, 2023, 3:00 pm EDT.
